snippet: In Carol Anshaw’s novel, a fatal accident becomes a lasting and looming shadow in the lives of the friends and lovers involved.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book Carry the One by Carol Anshaw.
lead_paragraph: In Carol Anshaw’s novel, a fatal accident becomes a lasting and looming shadow in the lives of the friends and lovers involved.

headline.seo: ‘Carry the One,’ a Novel by Carol Anshaw
headline.main: One Death That Haunts Many Lives
headline.print_headline: One Death That Haunts Many Lives
